text: A child does not notice the greatness and the beauty of nature and the splendor of God in his works.
author: Rudolf Otto

text: Once you go inside and weed through the muck, you will find the real beauty, the truth about yourself.
author: Lindsay Wagner

text: I used to wear a lot of red lipstick, and when I got a pimple, I'd cover it up with eyeliner to turn it into a beauty mark.
author: Selma Blair

text: I'm flatchested, I'm short, I'm brunette, I have droopy eyes, and so people have a hard time casting me as a 'beauty.'
author: Selma Blair

text: Doors open because you're beautiful, but I wouldn't cultivate beauty to the exclusion of brains.
author: Tia Carrere
